attributes.additional_details: When we ask the residents of the uk what is the purpose of the queen? i garuntee that most people will not know or struggle to find an answer because most people are not aware of what the queen does. The queen does nothing to support the country all she does is sign laws and epititions.The goverment can pass any law but the queen has not got the right to disagree with it so she has got no role in deciding laws thats why we should get rid of her because she's no use to the country
